thoughts.text: I think I can use the 'read_file' command to read the contents of a file and display them.
thoughts.reasoning: I want to read the contents of a file and display them, and using the 'read_file' command will allow me to do that easily.
thoughts.plan:
- Decide on the file name to read.
- Use the 'read_file' command to read the contents of the file.
- Display the contents of the file.
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful to make sure the file exists and is readable before trying to read its contents.
thoughts.speak: I think I can use the 'read_file' command to read the contents of a file and display them. I will need to be careful to make sure the file exists and is readable before trying to read its contents.
